ingredients.ingredient: 1 (6 ounce) box UNCLE BEN'S® Brown Rice & Quinoa Roasted Red Pepper
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 canned chipotle chile in adobo sauce, finely chopped
1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, or more to taste

cookingTips: Cook rice-quinoa mix according to package directions and cool completely before mixing with other ingredients
Add avocado and mango just before serving to prevent browning and maintain texture
Adjust lime juice and chipotle heat level to taste—more lime brightens the salad
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How far ahead can I prepare this salad? Which components can I prep in advance without losing quality?
